It seems like this is probably the best work the author has as all his other stuff looks like actual NTR trash. This was never going to go the way the kid wanted. Girl never looked his way, regardless of him going "If only I had x" at the end. He had the hotter of the two chicks and I just don't get it. When I was a kid I was very lacking in confidence but I still did some confessions. I had a "crush" on basically any cute girl in class but it didn't get me upset if they dated someone because I never approached them and I'd feel sad for a day or two after a rejection but I got over it. The response MC shows here is like if he watched his GF cheating on him which just confuses the hell out of me as he has no reason to react that way. While this could have been much worse, like him watching the dude fuck both, this still is questionable as a hentai. Almost no scene time is given to the girl mc is with and while the other two are a bit more explicit the sexual content is glossed over.
